texts.overview: [color=title]Shield[/color] grants you [color=title]time-limited invincibility[/color] against all damage in the game. Its timer steadily decreases over time, and any [color=title]damage[/color] you suffer accelerates that timer's decrease.

If you unlock [color=title]Shield[/color], you will lose access to the [color=title]Wall[/color] skill.
Further upgrading the [color=title]Shield[/color] skill will increase the shield's initial duration and lessen the [color=title]time penalty[/color] you endure when taking damage.

texts.overview: The alpha [color=title]Shield[/color] upgrade extends the [color=dim]base duration[/color] of the effect. It also absorbs a small percentage of any [color=title]damage[/color] you incur, allowing the shield to withstand more punishment.
